amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any Federal acquisition of lands in Montana until the Secretaries of Interior and Agriculture issue a plan for acquisition and disposal of lands in Montana.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in House Report 106-612 to prohibit any federal acquisition of lands in Montana until the Secretaries of Interior and Agriculture issue a plan for acquisition and disposal of lands in Montana.

action.text: Hill (MT) amendment (A018) modified by unanimous consent. Modification removes the requirement for the Secretaries to issue a plan prior to Federal acquisition.
On agreeing to the Hill (MT) amendment (A018) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
